cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with erasure coding in distributed storage, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the organization of nodes into racks, which is a common technique in distributed storage systems and falls under the category of system and network architecture (cs.SI). The paper also mentions the use of finite fields, which is a topic in number theory and algebraic coding theory (cs.NI). Finally, the paper discusses the construction of codes, which is a topic in coding theory (cs.CC).
